channel.title: CVE Feed for electron-pdf -- electron-pdf
channel.description: The latest CVEs for electron-pdf -- electron-pdf

item.title: CVE-2024-1648|2024-02-20T00:01:50.680Z -- electron-pdf -- electron-pdf
item.description:
electron-pdf version 20.0.0 allows an external attacker to remotely obtain
arbitrary local files. This is possible because the application does not
validate the HTML content entered by the user.
